Name: Cereal & Chill
Review Text: Was excited about the opening, as I was passing by sooo many times before they were open. I waited a few weeks to try out. Well, I was a bit disappointed. I have no idea, what I was expecting, but it sure turned out to be much more simpler ‚Ä¶

Name: Cereal & Chill
Review Text: Great variety of American cereal brands that you can have with milk or waffles. Small and cozy interior where you can even play some retro video games and Uno.

Name: Cereal & Chill
Review Text: Food tasted A-MA-ZIN. The guy working there was also super nice. I loved the nostalgic 90's vibe of the place. The food is also super cheap, I'd definitely recommend. It's a super cozy place as well.

Name: Cereal & Chill
Review Text:
Atypical place, welcoming and smiling staff: I recommend it!
A return to childhood as we all love it.

Name: Cereal & Chill
Review Text: This was a good side trip in Amsterdam. Food was fun we mixed three types of cereal and add candy as a topping and then had our choice of milk. I chose the oat. The food was good the cereal was fresh. The restaurant was decorated very ‚Ä¶

Name: Cereal & Chill
Review Text: A very unique place which I enjoyed a lot! Coffee is great and not too expensive (Cappuccino 2,50‚Ç¨). I will come here again üëç

Name: Cereal & Chill
Review Text: Food is nice, but during the pandemic the national safety guidelines were not upheld. They do nothing to ensure the safety of the customer. They sat down two people next to me at my table without asking and they were sitting super close. Definitely not 1.5m distance. Not cool.

Name: Cereal & Chill
Review Text:

Name: Cereal & Chill

Name: Cereal & Chill
Review Text: As a 90s kid, this place is as amazing as it is nostalgic. The music is all 90s hip-hop, they have oldschool games and all the best cereals. They also have a verity of milk so if you're like me and drink almond milk. This is definitely one place every 90s kid should check out üòÅ

Name: Cereal & Chill
Review Text: The concept has been copied from other countries (Cereal Killer Cafe in London, for example) and is as simple as it is profitable: import American cereal boxes, add milk. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cereal & Chill
Review Text: This is the ultimate place to go if you love cereal. They have a huge selection of unique cereals. The staff is super friendly and the place looks really cool!

Name: Cereal & Chill
Review Text: Fun cereal cafe with a great 90's vibe. They have a huge selection of cereal to choose from (over 100), iconic American drinks and snacks, delicious freakshakes, and tostis. For those of you who want to chill, there's a spot in the cafe ‚Ä¶

Review Text: A lot of different cereals to choose from, and games like Uno on the tables are a fun add on and get you to spend the whole day there :)

Name: Cereal & Chill
Review Text: Amazing people, amazing food. Cereal Cafe like no other. Love the 90s vibe and damn does it come with great service!

Name: Cereal & Chill
Review Text: getting to eat (almost) every kind of cereal, any time of day; ehm hallo, every childhood dream come true! Didn‚Äôt know we needed this spot but I sure am happy we have it!
